[[inst_hl_swip]]
==== HL.SWIP

*Syntax:* hl.swip SrcD, SrcD1, [SrcR, simm]

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_swip.svg[HL.SWIP encoding,width=800]

*Group:* STA/PAIR
